author: bigmistqke
message:
Add extended port hit area, lowercase button labels, sync decision graph

- Split GraphPort into two circles: larger transparent hit area for easier
  edge connections and smaller visible port dot (pointer-events: none)
- Move onPointerUp handler to extended circle for better UX
- Lowercase button labels ("new graph", "resume audio")
- Sync decision graph with missing commit history (30+ nodes added)

author: bigmistqke
message:
Add 10px grid with snap-to-grid and dot pattern

- Visible dot grid via SVG pattern in userSpaceOnUse
- Node drag and resize snap to 10px grid
- addNode positions snap to grid
- Meter width 33 -> 30 for grid alignment
- Tuned layout constants for grid compatibility

author: bigmistqke
message:
Move sequencer to AudioWorklet for sample-accurate timing

Sequencer gate signal is now generated directly in the audio thread's
process loop, eliminating rAF and look-ahead scheduling entirely. Both
sequencer and envelope run as AudioWorklets with sample-accurate timing.

author: bigmistqke
message:
Add Button CSS module and update local settings

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: bigmistqke
message:
Replace setTimeout sequencer with global rAF tick + Web Audio look-ahead scheduling

Sequencer now uses a shared requestAnimationFrame loop and schedules gate
changes ahead via setValueAtTime for sample-accurate timing. Envelope
replaced with an AudioWorklet that detects gate transitions at sample rate
and generates ADSR curves directly on the audio thread.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: bigmistqke
message:
Merge audio projection into createGraph, eliminate side-channel Maps

Move audio factory into NodeTypeDef alongside render, so each node type
is self-contained. createGraph now accepts an optional audioContext and
handles audio node lifecycle + edge connections internally.

Audio factory returns a `data` field exposed via RenderProps.audio,
replacing the 6 external Maps (analyserNodes, meterNodes, debugNodes,
workletNodes, envelopeTriggers, sequencerGates) that were used as
side-channels between render and audio.

Delete create-graph-projection.ts — its logic is absorbed into createGraph.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: bigmistqke
message:
Refine heading/port layout constants and fix port vertical alignment

Add HEADING_PADDING_BLOCK/INLINE constants, use them for node title and
delete button positioning. Fix port cy to include PORT_RADIUS offset for
proper vertical centering. Use transparent stroke on ports, fix indentation
in GraphPort event handlers.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: bigmistqke
message:
Move node CSS to GraphNode.module.css, port labels to SVG text in GraphPort

Extract node-related styles from App.module.css into GraphNode.module.css.
Move port label rendering from HTML spans in GraphNode to SVG <text> elements
in GraphPort. Rename constants for clarity (PORT_OFFSET→TITLE_HEIGHT,
CONTENT_PADDING→CONTENT_PADDING_BLOCK/INLINE) and refine layout calculations.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: bigmistqke
message:
Add design system constants with height calculator, replace hardcoded values

Extract ELEMENT_HEIGHT, CONTENT_GAP, CONTENT_PADDING into constants.ts with
headerHeight() and calcNodeHeight() functions. Pass values as CSS variables
and use them in component styles. Replace CSS composes with clsx.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: bigmistqke
message:
Refactor GraphNode to single foreignObject HTML body, remove NodeUI

Node body (header, title, labels, delete button, content, resize
handle) is now all HTML inside one foreignObject. Only SVG port
circles remain as SVG. NodeUI wrapper removed and all render
functions inlined.

author: bigmistqke
message:
Move title to NodeTypeDef and render in GraphNode, lighter borders

Title is now part of the node type config and rendered by GraphNode
directly. NodeUI simplified to just a foreignObject wrapper. Borders
and separator lines use lighter color-mix. Includes user CSS tweaks
to port labels, foreignObject sizing, and UI components.

author: bigmistqke
message: White background for node UI content area, colored header for ports

author: bigmistqke
message:
Redesign node layout: UI content below ports with always-visible labels

Move node UI content beneath port area using contentY, add separator
line between ports and content, show port labels inside nodes at all
times, and derive non-resizable node dimensions from template config.

author: bigmistqke
message: Move drag handler to group element, add pointer event blocking for sliders

author: bigmistqke
message:
Add volume meter node with RMS level bar

Pass-through audio with a vertical bar showing RMS level.
Green below 0.5, yellow below 0.8, red above.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: bigmistqke
message:
Zero AudioParam intrinsic value when signal is connected

Web Audio connections are additive, so the connected signal was being
added to the slider value. Now the param value is saved and zeroed on
connect, and restored on disconnect.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: bigmistqke
message:
Add debug node that displays param signal value as live text

Reads incoming signal via AnalyserNode and polls with
requestAnimationFrame to show the current value.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: bigmistqke
message:
Deselect sidebar node type after placing and start with none selected

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: bigmistqke
message:
Color temporary edge by source port kind

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: bigmistqke
message:
Use --color-node CSS variable for node and button colors

Set --color-node on elements and derive fill/stroke/background/border
via color-mix in CSS instead of inline style computation.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: bigmistqke
message:
Color node and button borders by first output port kind

Use dynamic var(--color-port-${kind}) for node rect stroke, sidebar
button border, and edge stroke. Lightened with color-mix for borders.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: bigmistqke
message:
Use CSS variables for port and edge colors

Define --color-port-audio, --color-port-param, --color-port-output
and derive port strokes with color-mix.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: bigmistqke
message:
Color edges to match their output port kind

Blue for audio, red for param, green for output.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: bigmistqke
message:
Fix envelope to properly reach zero using setTargetAtTime

Replace linearRampToValueAtTime with setTargetAtTime which works from
the current automated value without needing to read src.offset.value
(which only returns the intrinsic value, not the scheduled one).

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: bigmistqke
message:
Fix sequencer BPM to update in real-time without resetting position

Replace setInterval with recursive setTimeout so each step reads the
current BPM value when scheduling the next tick.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: bigmistqke
message:
Add Select component and use it for oscillator type switching

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: bigmistqke
message:
Add step sequencer node with gate output and envelope gate input

Sequencer has a 16-step grid with play/stop and BPM control, outputting
a gate signal (0/1). Envelope now accepts a gate input that detects
transitions via AnalyserNode polling — gate high triggers attack/decay/
sustain, gate low triggers release.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: bigmistqke
message:
Add scale and range modulation nodes

Scale multiplies a signal by a factor. Range maps a [-1,1] signal to a
[min,max] range using gain + constant source offset, making it easy to
route an LFO to meaningful parameter ranges like filter frequency.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: bigmistqke
message:
Allow deselecting node type by clicking active sidebar button

Clicking an already-selected button deselects it. Clicking the canvas
with no type selected no longer spawns a node.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: bigmistqke
message:
Style sidebar as single column with left scrollbar and backdrop blur

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: bigmistqke
message:
Add reverb, waveshaper, and analyser nodes

Reverb uses ConvolverNode with algorithmic impulse response (decay + dry/wet mix).
Waveshaper provides distortion via WaveShaperNode with 4x oversampling.
Analyser renders a live oscilloscope waveform on canvas, passing audio through.
Also passes nodeId to projection factories so analyser can register itself.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: bigmistqke
message: Add filter, delay, panner, compressor, and noise nodes

author: bigmistqke
message:
Add persistence with makePersisted and routing with @solidjs/router

- Graph topology and node states persisted to localStorage via makePersisted
- Each route /:graphName is a separate persisted graph
- Custom types persisted globally, reconstructed with render functions on load
- Worklet files initialized from persisted state on graph load
- createGraph accepts persistName option, uses consolidated store for nodeStates
- Replaced ReactiveMap with store-based adapter in createGraph for serializability
- App split into thin route wrapper + GraphEditor (re-mounts on graph switch)
- HUD shows graph name, "New Graph" button navigates to new route

author: bigmistqke
message:
Add save custom node as reusable type with reactive shared source

- Config is now a reactive store (createStore), new types appear in toolbar
- Custom nodes get "Save as Type" button that prompts for name and registers type
- Saved nodes show "Save" (updates all instances) and "Save as" (new type)
- Saving transforms the current node into the saved type
- Projection uses Proxy fallback to custom factory for dynamic types
- GraphNode typeDef is now reactive to support type switching
- RenderProps includes node id, updateNode accepts type changes

author: bigmistqke
message: Add deciduous decision graph, Claude Code config, and GitHub workflows

author: bigmistqke
message:
Add HUD overlay for toolbar, refine styling and port label positioning

Move toolbar to absolute-positioned HUD overlay with pointer-events
passthrough. Use PORT_RADIUS for port label offsets. Lighten stroke
color, use edge color for temporary edges.

author: bigmistqke
message:
Add CSS variables for colors, use clsx for toolbar buttons, reformat styles

Extract stroke/text colors into CSS custom properties. Use clsx for
toolbar button class toggling. Add nodeButton styles to CSS module.
Reformat App.module.css indentation to 2 spaces.

author: bigmistqke
message:
Add resizable nodes with bottom-right drag handle

New resizable flag on NodeTypeDef. GraphNode renders a diagonal line
handle with a transparent triangle hit area at the bottom-right corner.
Custom node is resizable by default.

author: bigmistqke
message:
Use HorizontalSlider for worklet params, add min/max/step props, adjust layout

Refactor param UI to reuse HorizontalSlider with configurable min/max/step.
Simplify NodeUI layout calculations and set PORT_INSET to 0.

author: bigmistqke
message:
Auto-generate UI for worklet parameters and add gain to boilerplate

Discover AudioParam entries from the AudioWorkletNode at runtime and
render sliders for each parameter. Boilerplate now includes a gain
parameter with parameterDescriptors to demonstrate the feature.

author: bigmistqke
message:
Auto-generate custom node name and guard against missing input

Remove name prompt for custom nodes — name is auto-generated from node ID.
Fix crash when deleting a connected custom node by guarding against
undefined input channels in the worklet processor boilerplate.

author: bigmistqke
message:
Separate worklet source and entry files

User code uses export default class convention in /<name>/source.js.
Generated /<name>/worklet.js imports from it and calls registerProcessor.
The transform resolves the import path to the source blob URL reactively.

author: bigmistqke
message:
Add custom AudioWorklet node with live code editing

Introduces a virtual file system (ReactiveMap + createFileUrlSystem) for
dynamically compiling and loading AudioWorklet processors. Users can create
custom nodes, name them, and edit processor code in a textarea. Worklets
hot-reload on edit using versioned processor names.

author: bigmistqke
message:
Extract HorizontalSlider component and adjust node UI layout

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: bigmistqke
message:
Keep port labels visible while dragging from a port

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: bigmistqke
message:
Reveal port names on cursor proximity to nodes

Port labels appear outside the node (left for inputs, right for outputs)
when the cursor approaches within 60px. Labels fade in instantly and
linger for 1s before fading out over 1s.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: bigmistqke
message:
Add constant node, isInputConnected, and rename edge fields to output/input

Add ConstantSourceNode type for driving AudioParams externally. Add
isInputConnected to RenderProps so sliders disable when port is connected.
Rename Edge fields from from/to to output/input for clarity.

author: bigmistqke
message:
Refactor createNodeComponent into NodeUI component

Replace factory function with a proper Solid component that receives
render props and renders title and foreignObject wrapper. Node type
definitions now use inline render with NodeUI.

author: bigmistqke
message:
Move create-graph and create-node-component into lib directory

Reorganize file structure, moving core graph modules under src/lib.
Update all imports accordingly.

author: bigmistqke
message:
Improve projection factory typings to infer state from graph config

Use StateOf utility type to extract each node type's state type from
the graph config, replacing the untyped any parameter.

author: bigmistqke
message:
Add per-node dimensions with setDimensions in render props

Store dimensions on each node instance instead of reading from the type
definition. Add setDimensions to RenderProps so render functions can
resize their own node. Update all components to read dimensions from
the node instance.

author: bigmistqke
message:
Refactor App.tsx into separate modules

Extract constants, contexts, and components into their own files.
App.tsx now only contains the graph config, audio projection, and
canvas layout.

author: bigmistqke
message:
Add createNodeComponent factory and use props object for render

Change render signature to receive a props object with state, setState,
and dimensions. Add createNodeComponent factory that handles title and
foreignObject boilerplate so node definitions only provide inner content.

author: bigmistqke
message:
Refine port layout, delete button, and foreignObject styling

Adjust port spacing/offset/inset constants. Use foreignObject for delete
button. Add foreignObject class to disable pointer-events on wrapper
while allowing them on children. Align render content with port layout.

author: bigmistqke
message:
Add node deletion and edge re-dragging from in-ports

Add delete button (x) on nodes, visible on hover. Add unlink method to
graph. Dragging from an in-port with an existing edge detaches it and
lets the user reconnect to another port or release to delete.

author: bigmistqke
message:
Validate port kind compatibility on link

Only allow connections between ports with matching kind values.

author: bigmistqke
message:
Add port kind styling and disable selection during drag

Color ports by data-kind attribute (blue default, red param, green output).
Set data-dragging on root SVG during any drag to disable user-select and
clear existing selection.

author: bigmistqke
message:
Add typed node registry, generic graph projection, and audio wiring

Rewrite createGraph to accept a node type config with dimensions, ports,
state, and render. Add createGraphProjection for reactive graph-to-domain
mapping using mapArray + ReactiveMap. Wire up oscillator, gain, and
destination nodes with Web Audio as a projection.

author: bigmistqke
message: initial commit
